The image and caption were originally po: but the attribution to "Time magazine's 'perfect body'" had appeared on Twitter in December 2013.
The claims about the photograph were sim: circulating rumors about Marilyn Monroe's dress size, which were debunked in a December 2013 article by Simon Doonan.
The subject of the photograph: Aria Giovanni, is an adult film star who was not even born until 1977, making it impossible for her to be a 1955 model.
Authentic 1955 images of women in bikini: such as JET magazine, do not resemble the photograph in question.
